name: Patent Search Agent
description: Search and retrieve US patent data including inventors, assignees, citations, and classifications. Powered by PatentsView. All endpoints $0.005: /search - keyword search, /patent - get by ID, /recent - recent grants, /inventor - by inventor, /company - by assignee.
